title: Modern 2BR 1.5BA w/ Parking, A/C, Laundry - Pets OK!- Avail NOW!
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 136313121', 'Rent: $3,600 / Month', 'Beds: 2', 'Bath: 1.5', 'Available Date: 09/01/2022', 'Pet: Negotiable', 'Parking:: off-street parking', 'This is the ONE!', 'Modern, top floor 2BR condo sprawling across 1,100 sq.', 'ft. located around the corner from Inman and only a 15 minute walk to both Central and Kendall Squares.', ' Both bedrooms are HUGE and the master has a full walk-in closet/office space.', ' Entertain all your friends in the massive, open concept kitchen/dining area complete with a full granite island and wine rack.', ' Unit has 1.5 baths, modern, stainless appliances, and laundry in UNIT!', ' There is a small, private balcony off the back and one off street parking space is included in rent.', ' Unit also has central AC!', 'Pets may be negotiable on a case-by-case basis and unit is available for an August or September 1st move in.', ' Inquire today!', 'FEATURES', 'A/C', 'Balcony', 'Dining Room', 'Dishwasher', 'Disposal', 'Eat-in Kitchen', 'Gas Heat', 'Gas Stove', 'Granite Counter Tops', 'Hardwood Floors', 'High Ceiling', 'Laundry in Unit', 'Microwave', 'Modern Bath', 'Modern Kitchen', 'New Appliances', 'Private Deck', 'Stainless Steel Appliance(s)', 'Storage', 'Agent:', 'Matthew', 'Phone: 617-872-7656', 'Email: matthew  <URL>', 'Follow us for new listings and real estate news!', '      Facebook: @RentSource          Instagram: @Rent_Source', '**', 'FOR MORE GREAT LISTINGS AND TO SIGN UP FOR AUTO LISTING UPDATES VISIT OUR WEBSITE AT WWW.RENTSOURCELLC.COM **', 'Rent Source supports Equal Housing Opportunity.', ' Rates, fee, and availability subject to change, so please call to verify details.', 'Pictures may not be of exact unit.']
